job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the integration of AI capabilities into existing software architecture, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for the full lifecycle of a product, which falls under the broader scope of software development and project management within that domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly details the task of building and coding web applications, including front-end and back-end integration, which is a direct match for software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the direct engagement with and experimentation using specific AI models (LLMs), aligning with the definition of working with and potentially fine-tuning or adapting models.

job_tasks.phrase: to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of using AI technologies, which is the creation of functional tools and features within applications, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights end-to-end responsibility for technical projects, encompassing the full software development lifecycle from conception to deployment and iteration.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of developing and delivering AI-powered applications, focusing on their impact and functionality, which is a software engineering responsibility.

soft_skills.justification: This describes a mindset focused on new ideas and creative problem-solving, which aligns with innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates taking full responsibility and initiative for a product, which is a key aspect of ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process
soft_skills.justification: This highlights taking initiative and responsibility for the complete project lifecycle, fitting the definition of ownership and driving projects.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with a team and the importance of effective communication, directly mapping to the Communication & Collaboration category.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need to constantly learn and adapt to new technologies and advancements, which is the core definition of Learning & Adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement emphasizes a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (integrating AI into front-end and back-end systems, architecting and coding web applications, owning the entire product development process) and AI specialization (working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create tools and features). The role requires building AI-powered applications, indicating a strong software engineering component, while the specific use of LLMs points to Generative AI. This blend of deep software development with specific GenAI technologies fits the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining the responsibilities, technologies, and expectations. It contrasts what the role is and is not, providing unambiguous guidance for classification. The alignment with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile is strong and well-supported by the text.
